}}'''2.0.1003''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.0.1004''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.0.1005''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on October 25, 2017.

== Fixes ==
* Fix for startup of modded versions.
* {{bug|MCL-1905}}: legacy.json missing causing <code>java.io.FileNotFoundException</code>.
* {{bug|MCL-8255}}: Java 9: Unrecognized VM Option 'CMSIncrementalMode'.
